title: Market Trading Guide: Buy Policybazaar, EPL and 2 more smallcap stocks on Wednesday. Up to 9% upside seen
summary: Nifty is expected to remain volatile with no clear short-term trend, as per LKP Securities’ Rupak De. Analysts recommend buying Zota Health, Choice International, Policybazaar, and EPL, citing bullish technical setups, breakouts, and strong momentum indicators.

title: SC notes ECI’s eagerness to correct ‘mistakes’ in Bihar draft roll
summary: Petitioners reminded the court of its promise to step in if the Special Intensive Revision (SIR) led to “mass exclusion” of electors from the preliminary voters’ list.
fullContent: Petitioners reminded the court of its promise to step in if the Special Intensive Revision (SIR) led to “mass exclusion” of electors from the preliminary voters’ list
